name: Lumina (helenamb)
description:
Lumina is a short 3D videogame for PC developed in Unreal Engine 4 as a school final project. 

It could be any night, in any city. A little girl walks on the street, holding her mom's hand. Suddenly, something catches her attention. When she turns around she can see a tiny animal looking at her - a black cat. She cannot help but follow him. 'It will only be a minute' she thought, as she only wanted to know where the feline was headed to. 

What she does not know is that nothing happens by chance, and nothing is what it seems.

Developed by: The Fancy Restroom

  • Helena Martí: Game Director, Concept Artist, Illustrator, co-Animator.
  • Aitor González: Level & Map Designer.
  • Mar Masó: Lead 3D Modeller, Texture Artist.
  • Paula Moreta: Lead Texture Artist, 3D Modeller, UI designer.
  • Xavier Merino: Programmer, co-Animator.
  • Aaron Ramirez: Sound Designer and Original Soundtrack Composer.

Lumina is currently available only in Spanish.
